title: spiderman: into the spiderverse
description: vibrant. every frame is pulled from a comic-book panel. gorgeous art direction, taking animation and comic books where they have never gone before in cinemetography. a gripping, heart-warming story about a kid from brooklyn taking a (rather large) leap of faith.

title: captain marvel
description: it was about time we got a female superhero around here

title: the darkest minds
quoted: say you'll remember me / standing in a nice dress / staring at the sunset, babe / red lips and rosy cheeks / say you'll see me again / even if it's just in your wildest dreams

title: mamma mia
quoted: waterloo. couldn't escape if i wanted to. knowing my fate is to be with you.

title: jonas brothers
quoted: you say the word and i'll go anywhere blindly
description: and all of a sudden, it's like watching the past ten years of your life musically unravel, all the pieces from burnin' up to the year 3000, pieced together and then completely redone. this is the soundtrack of peak nostalgia, of a childhood favorite all grown up. an old friend on his guitar rendered a complete rockstar.

title: fantastic beasts: crimes of grindelwald
description: so this is how it begins and ends?
